title: 1926 College Football All-Southern Team
text:
The 1926 College Football All-Southern Team consists of <a href="American%20football">American football</a> players selected to the <a href="College%20Football%20All-Southern%20Team">College Football All-Southern Team</a>s selected by various organizations for the <a href="1926%20Southern%20Conference%20football%20season">1926 Southern Conference football season</a>. <a href="1926%20Alabama%20Crimson%20Tide%20football%20team">Alabama</a> won the <a href="Southern%20Conference">SoCon</a> and <a href="College%20football%20national%20championships%20in%20NCAA%20Division%20I%20FBS">national</a> championship.
Composite eleven.
The All-Southern eleven compiled by the Associated Press included:
Composite overview.
<a href="Hoyt%20Winslett">Hoyt Winslett</a> received the most votes, 37 of a possible 41.
